message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can find a specific line item that shows this information:

```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-01-31 |
| Beginning Balance  | 8000000.00 | 2024-01-31 |
```

This clearly shows that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 8,000,000.00.

I can also verify this by looking at the balance sheet, which shows:
```
| Cash on Hand | 3000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 735892.55 | 2024-01-31 |
| Bank Deposits | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 103027.27 | 2024-01-31 |
```

The initial amounts of Cash on Hand (3,000,000.00) and Bank Deposits (5,000,000.00) sum up to 8,000,000.00, confirming the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

{"solution": {'value': '8000000.00'}}
